title: List of all Android request  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android request  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Dexter
repoList.description: Android library that simplifies the process of requesting permissions at runtime.

repoList.name: rx-android-permissions
repoList.description: Simple RxJava library for requesting and observing Android runtime permissions

repoList.name: robospice
repoList.description: Repo of the Open Source Android library : RoboSpice. RoboSpice is a modular android library that makes writing asynchronous long running tasks easy. It is specialized in network requests, supports caching and offers REST requests out-of-the box using extension modules.

repoList.name: Android-Architecture-Components
repoList.description: The template project that uses Android Architecture Components with Repository pattern. The simple app that uses awesome Fuel library instead of Retrofit for perfoming HTTP request. The app also persists data using the Room library and display data in RecyclerView.

repoList.name: NoPermission
repoList.description: Android library for permissions request (updated 27.11.2017)

repoList.name: easyFoursquare4Android
repoList.description: Library to easy make foursquare requests

repoList.name: HttpAgent
repoList.description: super simple library to manage http requests.

repoList.name: retroauth
repoList.description: A library build on top of retrofit, for simple handling of authenticated requests

repoList.name: rating-request
repoList.description: RatingRequest library is a simple android dialog for request rating and review.

repoList.name: kpermissions
repoList.description: A Kotlin library which helps to request runtime permissions in Android.

repoList.description: Android library that simplifies the process of requesting permissions at runtime.
